ChunkText: please request a letter from isss if you plan to use this method of travel, as sometimes the border guards dont recall this exception and a letter that cites this regulation will help make sure you have a smooth return to the us.
ContextBefore: short trips to canada, mexico or some caribbean islands with an expired f-1 visa automatic visa revalidation students who have a valid I-20 and are in good f-1 status, but whose visa has expired, are able to take short trips less than 30 days to countries neighboring the US to canada, mexico and some caribbean islands.
ContextAfter: please note this option is unfortunately not available for students from countries considered by the US government to be state sponsors of terrorism.
